name: PrimaryCare-FamilyMemberHistoryReporter-Extension
display: Primary Care family member history reporter extension
description: The source of the information about the family member history that is recorded.

element.definition: Optional Extensions Element - found in all resources.

element.short: identifies the meaning of the extension
element.definition: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.
element.comments: The definition may point directly to a computable or human-readable definition of the extensibility codes, or it may be a logical URI as declared in some other specification. The definition should be version specific.  This will ideally be the URI for the Resource Profile defining the extension, with the code for the extension after a #.

element.short: Source of the information about the family member history
element.definition: The source of the information about the family member history that is recorded.
element.comments: The recorder takes repsonsibility for the content.
